text:
The 2020 presidential campaign of Seth Moulton, the U.S. Representative from Massachusetts's 6th congressional district, was launched on April 22, 2019, when Moulton announced said that he will run to win the Democratic nomination for the 2020 presidential election.
On April 22, 2019, Moulton said that he would seek the Democratic nomination for president during an interview on "Good Morning America", stating that "I am here to tell you and to tell America that I am running for President of the United States."
Moulton suspended his campaign on August 23, 2019 due to low polling numbers and failed qualifications for the debates.
